historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 18-365 substituted "Within 90 days of April 8, 2011" for "Within 90 days of February 2, 2008".

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-103, see notes following § 50-1641.01.

For history of Law 18-365, see notes under § 50-1641.05.

DC CODE § 50-1641.07

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Within 90 days of April 8, 2011, the Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.
All rules promulgated under this subchapter shall be submitted to the Council for review and approval.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)
